freenet.client
Class FECCodec

java.lang.Object
  freenet.client.FECCodec
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandardOnionFECCodec
public abstract class FECCodec
extends Object

FEC (forward error correction) handler. I didn't keep the old freenet.client.FEC* etc as it seemed grossly overengineered with a lot of code there only because of API confusion.

Author:
root
